mapper.insert: insert into t_support_org_branch (id, org_code, up_org_code, up_branch, deep) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upBranch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deep,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select up_org_code from t_support_org_branch where org_code = #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and up_branch = 1
